Challenge your ideas and cultivate your creativity at Victoria’s Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences.

Our diverse range of courses and location in the nation’s capital and cultural heart will provide you with unrivalled opportunities to build your future.

Asian Languages and Cultures

Study the cultures and languages of the world's biggest, most populous continent, Asia. Become a truly global citizen with the communication skills to bridge cultural and linguistic gaps.

Available subjects

  • Asian Studies
  • Chinese
  • Japanese
Find out more
